title: SOLD: 1909-11 T206 Piedmont - Zach Wheat HOF RC (BGS 1.5)
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1909-11 T206 Piedmont - Zach Wheat HOF RC (BGS 1.5)
posts.post_content:
Good Morning, Collectors:

Up for sale today is a 1909-11 T206 Piedmont - Zach Wheat HOF Rookie Card which has been graded a BGS 1.5 by the strict graders at Beckett Grading Services, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review enlarged scans of the front and back of the card for condition details. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]

You call everybody the "the industry leader in third-party grading"! 
Good luck with the sale. :)
